name: Sound
description: Simple Music Player to Play MP3 Files.You Can Open Media Files or Whole Directory to Play

scripts.package-win: electron-packager . Sound --overwrite --asar --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=assets/icons/win32.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName="Mehar Software House" --version-string.FileDescription="Sound by Mehar Software House" --version-string.ProductName="Sound"

author: Mehar Software House
